result.eng: There is nothing we can do about the power of the media.
result.ga: níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meán
result.orig: níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meán
result.html: níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meánThere is nothing we can do about the power of the media.
result.ponchtml: níl neart againn ar ċuṁaċt na meánThere is nothing we can do about the power of the media.

result.eng: If it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ga: más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.orig: más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.html: más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ponchtml: más aṁlaiḋ go ḃfuil na páirtiṫe sásta cuṁaċt a roinnt beiḋ coṁrialtas ann sul i ḃfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.

result.eng: He made the prisoners aware of his power.
result.ga: chuir sé a chumhacht in iúl do na príosúnaigh
result.orig: chuir sé a chumhacht in iúl do na príosúnaigh
result.html: chuir sé a chumhacht in iúl do na príosúnaighHe made the prisoners aware of his power.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sé a ċuṁaċt in iúl do na príosúnaiġHe made the prisoners aware of his power.

result.eng: Things were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ga: bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na naitsithe sa ghearmáin
result.orig: bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na naitsithe sa ghearmáin
result.html: bhí cúrsaí contúirteach tar éis urghabháil chumhachta na naitsithe sa ghearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
result.ponchtml: ḃí cúrsaí contúirteaċ tar éis urġaḃáil ċuṁaċta na naitsiṫe sa ġearmáinThings were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.

result.eng: Online, cowards have power without responsbility.
result.ga: tá cumhacht gan fhreagracht ag na meatacháin ar líne

result.ponchtml: tá cuṁaċt gan ḟreagraċt ag na meataċáin ar líneOnline, cowards have power without responsbility.

result.eng: Voters prefer candidates who already have power.
result.ga: is fearr le vótóirí an té a bhíos i seilbh na cumhachta
result.orig: is fearr le vótóirí an té a bhíos i seilbh na cumhachta
